body_html:
I reduced the test case to a much simpler graph:

lstm_cell = tf.contrib.rnn.BasicLSTMCell(64)

outputs, _ = tf.nn.dynamic_rnn(lstm_cell,
    dtype=tf.float32,
    inputs=tf.constant([[[1.,1.,1.]], [[1.,1.,0.]]]),
    sequence_length=tf.constant([3,2]))

pred = tf.add(outputs, tf.constant(0.), name="y")

I reused the repository for a different (but related) issue, #7949. So the code for this is now on branch tf_issue_7162 there: https://github.com/reuben/tf-export-test/tree/tf_issue_7162

body:
I reduced the test case to a much simpler graph:

```python
lstm_cell = tf.contrib.rnn.BasicLSTMCell(64)

outputs, _ = tf.nn.dynamic_rnn(lstm_cell,
    dtype=tf.float32,
    inputs=tf.constant([[[1.,1.,1.]], [[1.,1.,0.]]]),
    sequence_length=tf.constant([3,2]))

pred = tf.add(outputs, tf.constant(0.), name="y")
```

I reused the repository for a different (but related) issue, #7949. So the code for this is now on branch tf_issue_7162 there: https://github.com/reuben/tf-export-test/tree/tf_issue_7162
